Package de.chojo.sadu.databases

Class PostgreSql

java.lang.Object
de.chojo.sadu.databases.DefaultDatabase<PostgreSqlJdbc,​PostgreSqlUpdaterBuilder>
de.chojo.sadu.databases.PostgreSql
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database<PostgreSqlJdbc,​PostgreSqlUpdaterBuilder>
public class PostgreSql
extends DefaultDatabase<PostgreSqlJdbc,​PostgreSqlUpdaterBuilder>
Represents a PostgreSQL database.

    • hasSchemas

      public boolean hasSchemas()
      Description copied from interface: Database
      Indicates if this type supports schemas.

      When schemas are supported the methods Database.createSchema(String) and Database.schemaExists() needs to be implemented.

      Returns:
      true when schemas are supported
